result.title: Invitation to the Hindustan University Multi Provincial contest 2015- Replay on CodeChef
result.content:
CodeChef invites you to participate in the replay contest of Hindustan University Multi Provincial contest 2015 at http://www.codechef.com/HUMP15R.


Time: 5th March 2015 (2000 hrs) to 6th March 2015 (0000 hrs). (Indian Standard Time — +5:30 GMT) — Check your timezone.

Registration:

  • Login with your normal CodeChef user ID
  • Click on the Team Registration link to register your team for the contest.
  • Click logout in the top right corner and login using the Team Name and password you registered with.
  • You can get more information about team contests here.

New users please register here

It promises to deliver on an interesting set of algorithmic problems with something for all.
The contest is open for all and those, who are interested, are requested to have a CodeChef userid, in order to participate.
